job description:
Job Responsibilities:
  • Assists all providers with record completion by utilizing the electronic Health Information systems via analysis, reanalysis, and assembly of all inpatient and same day surgery records, in according with State regulations, Hospital Rules and Regulations, Hospital Bylaws and Joint Commission requirements
  • Conducts concurrent and retrospective record reviews for qualitative analysis, plus ensures record counts for incomplete and delinquent records are accurate, and notifies and works with care providers to complete records
  • Serves as a liaison for care providers to the transcription service and assists with all processes to ensure an accurate electronic medical record via document management
Job Requirements:
  • Associate's Degree
    • 3 years direct HIM or other healthcare experience could be accepted in lieu of a degree
  • 1 year experience
    • Experience in a medical record or health information management department, medical office or other heathcare experience with emphasis on management of document’s in an electronic form would qualify as related work experience
  • RHIT or RHIA [or test eligible] preferred
  • Medical terminology
  • PC, Microsoft Office products and Electronic Health Record experience preferred
EEO Employer/Disabled/Vet
